scripts.build:dna: npm run build:wasm && hc dna pack --output=../artifacts/named_real.dna workdir && hc dna pack --output=../artifacts/named_integer.dna workdir_named_integer && npm run build:profiles
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && hc app pack --output=../artifacts/playground.happ workdir
scripts.build:happ:clone: npm run build:dna && hc app pack --output=../artifacts/playground-clone.happ workdir_clone
scripts.build-old: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp index.html dist
scripts.start: cross-env HAPP_BUILD_MODE='Debug' HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run new-sandbox:mem" "sleep 5 && npm run start:ui"
scripts.start:clone: cross-env HAPP_BUILD_MODE='Debug' HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run new-sandbox:mem:clone" "sleep 5 && npm run start:ui"
scripts.new-sandbox:mem: RUST_LOG=trace WASM_LOG=trace echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate ../artifacts/playground.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a playground network mem
scripts.new-sandbox:mem:clone: RUST_LOG=trace WASM_LOG=trace echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate ../artifacts/playground-clone.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a playground-clone network mem
scripts.launch: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc launch --piped ../artifacts/playground.happ -w --ui-path ./dist network mem
scripts.launch:clone: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc launch --piped ../artifacts/playground-clone.happ -w --ui-path ./dist network mem
